root.specsKey: Nikon Coolpix L840 Point & Shoot Camera (Plum)
Interface Data Transfer Protocol: MTP, PTP, I/O Terminal: Digital I/O (USB), NFC Connectivity
1/4000 sec (Maximum Speed During High-speed Continuous Shooting), 4 sec (when Scene Mode is Set to Fireworks Show)
Built-in Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Preflashes

Top Continuous Shooting Speed at Full Resolution: Upto 7 Shots/7.4 fps, Continuous Shooting Options: Best Shot Selector, Continuous H, Continuous H 60, Continuous H 120, Continuous L, Multi-shot 16, Pre-shooting Cache, Single
White Balance: Auto, Cloudy, Daylight, Flash, Fluorescent, Incandescent, White Balance Preset

Backlighting, Bird Watching, Beach, Close Up, Dusk / Dawn, Easy Panorama, Fireworks Show, Food, Landscape, Moon, Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Party / Indoor, Pet Portrait, Portrait, Scene Auto Selector, Snow, Sports, Sunset
Matrix, Center-weighted (Digital Zoom Less than 2x), Spot (Digital Zoom 2x or More)

Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portugese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukranian, Vietnamese

Vibration Reduction: Lens Shift VR (Still Pictures), Lens-shift and Electronic VR (Movies), Monitor Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode): 99% Horizontal and 99% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Monitor Frame Coverage (Playback Mode): 99% Horizontal and 99% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Camera Image Editing: Crop, D-Lighting, Filter Effects, Glamour Retouch, Quick Retouch, Red-eye Correction, Small Picture, Tripod Socket: 1/4 inch (ISO 1222), Battery: AA (Alkaline, NiMH, Oxyride or Lithium), Four LR6 / L40 (AA Size) Alkaline Batteries, Four FR6 / L91 (AA Size) Lithium Batteries, Four EN-MH2 Rechargeable Ni-MH Batteries, Battery Life (Shots per Charge): AA Alkaline: 590 Shots, AA Lithium: 1240 Shots, EN-MH2: 740, Movies: (AA Alkaline: 1 hr 35 min, AA Lithium: 4 hrs 30 min, EN-MH2: 2 hrs 30 min)
Digital Zoom: Upto 4x (Angle of View Equivalent to that of 3,420 mm Lens in 35 mm (135) Format), Aperture: Electronically Controlled ND Filter (-2.0 AV) Insertion, Lens Zoom: 38x

Autofocus (AF) Focus Area Selection: Center, Face Priority, Manual with 99 Focus Areas, Subject Tracking, Target Finding AF, Focus Lock: Yes, Macro Mode: All Distances Measured from Center of Front Surface of Lens
538 g (with Battery and SD Memory Card)
Auto, Scene, Scene Auto Selector, Short Movie Show, Smart Portrait, Special Effects
